alert.note: Alert for Limestone (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 6:08PM CDT until April 28 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LIMESTONE COUNTY... At 607 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Coolidge, or 11 miles west of Mexia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mexia, Coolidge, Lake Mexia, Fort Parker State Park, Tehuacana, Fallon, Shiloh and Prairie Hill. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Texas.
